description: This is a Python source file for a Streamlit web application that implements an agent-based research assistant with document management, session handling, and chat functionalities. It integrates various document readers, manages agent sessions, and provides a user interface for interaction.

methods.name: restart_agent
methods.description: Resets the agent and clears chat history, session state variables, and triggers a rerun of the app.

methods.name: get_reader
methods.description: Returns the appropriate document reader instance based on the provided file type.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that sets up the Streamlit app interface, manages session state, handles document uploads and URL inputs, and orchestrates the chat interaction with the agent.
